title: EWar Games
description: One of the leading gaming and E-Sprots platform for real money earning. Some of the nostalgic games can take back in time.

title: Be My Guest
description: It is a Tinder like app for both android and iOS users to offer different offers like movies, exibitions, dinner, and many more to eachother. It has matching functionality like Tinder which allows users to chat each other.

title: QServ
description: It is an android and iOS app for employees of certain company which helps to manage employee services. Employees can request for certain service and will be handled by the assigned agents. Different requests like: Booking meeting room, booking drinking service, cab service, maintenance, supplies, IT support etc.

title: PhotoStats
description: It is an android and iOS app developed to manage photos in our mobile storage with different actions like sorting, image tagging, and getting different image details.

title: Ultimate Athlete Program
role: Front End, App Feature Enhancement and Web Admin Panel Feature Enhancement
description: It is an app for android and iOS platform where user can get suggested workout schedule along with the workout instructions and video reference. User's day workout is being tracked.

title: Coding Is Good
description: It is a learning app. It basically teaches you Python programming language with different topics divided into modules. It will provide you basics and take you through certain test to track your achievements.

title: Project Partner
description: It is a webapp portal to provide platform to open bids/tender for different constructions activities and keep relation between the project owner and the work contractors. There are there users hierarchy ie. Project Owner, General Contractor and Sub Trade. There is tracking system for bids and cashflow along with the workflow. Integrated chat system in between the users associated to a project.

title: WiChat
role: Front End and Back End Developer
description: Whatsapp like chatting app with database fetch. You can have personal as well as group chat.

title: Indian Emergency Response Portal - IERP
role: Front End and Back End Developer
description: A web app to provide a interface to get emergency help of police, ambulance or other things. Live location tracking and live notifications.

title: Bathinda Homeopathy
role: Front End and Back End Developer
description: A desktop application to manage medicines and its sale and stock for a homeopathy.
